formCompanyData.title: Company Data
formCompanyData.infobox: Here you can store the address data of your company. This step is optional. Please note: you can only see prices and send requests with a full account!

infotext:
You can enter your company's address data here.
This step is optional

Please note: Only with A full account allows you to see prices and send requests!

registrationSuccessPage.title: Your registration was sent successfully
registrationSuccessPage.paragraph: We have sent a copy of your request to your email address. Your request will be processed by our service team as soon as possible.
